column1: One of Illinois’ great strengths is our regional diversity. Our response to #COVID19 must recognize those regional differences.  We need a plan to safely and regionally begin reopening that meets the health and economic needs of individual communities. https://t.co/QPiaU5vI28

#COVID19 did not create Illinois’ pension crisis; it illuminated one that already existed. The federal gov’t should not bail out Illinois’ fiscal mismanagement.   Congress should focus on helping Illinois workers small biz and health care professionals. https://t.co/F0KWo5MtxD
